directions: Whisk together the chile bean sauce, rice wine, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, ginger root, green onion, and sugar.  Place chicken strips in a large bowl and pour sauce over; refrigerate and allow to marinate for 30 to 40 minutes.
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large wok to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Remove the chicken strips from the marinade and sprinkle with the flour.  Deep fry chicken strips until crispy and no longer pink in the center, about 8 minutes. Drain cooked chicken on paper towels; serve hot.
ingredients: 3/4 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-by-1/2-inch strips
title: Hunan Chicken
